duties_responsibilities.duty: Triage and resolve ITIL incidents and tier 3 service desk tasks for specific infrastructure technologies.
Design and implement solutions with a focus on manageability and use automation where available.
Provide SME Support for Microsoft Infrastructure Applications and 'Other' Infrastructure Apps.
Document systems and processes with a focus on end-user self-service.
Participate and manage strategic and tactical infrastructure projects and initiatives.
Create and drive business process improvement and lead technical efforts to rollout and document infrastructure roadmap technologies.
Provide world class support to end-users and other IT teams for Infrastructure and application rollouts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred or eight years’ equivalent experience and training, and three years in a technical support or engineering role.Certifications in ITIL, AWS, GCP, Azure, ServiceNow, Microsoft (MCP/MCSA/MCSE), VMWare, Citrix, etc. preferred.
